topics.body:
You know, the most disturbing thing I've drawn that's good quality (because all drawings of bad quality is disturbing) would be a half tree, half cat hybrid.

Its entrails had broken out its stomach and became roots, its head starts to sprout horn-like branches (and one of them had the cat's eyeball on top) and its back legs became tree stumps (that were still connected btw). Worse of all, I imagined it still _being alive_ and quietly tortured.

I can't find the picture anymore and thank god as well. I drew it because I was bored my friend suggested an idea. His version was more innocent though.
